December 17, 2021
Brundun94
Specifically for Peter's Spider-man, I've read/heard a lot of fans in the game over the years bemoan how wk often fails to capture the character. And, idk, I just feel like we've gotten a lot of versions of that character, and some are definitive, some middle of the road, and some very narrow/situational, but almost always at least playable. I think the game has spoiled us as Spidey fans, and it's made the standard high for every version that rolls out. Failure to meet that expectation meets sharp criticism that isn't always warranted. This one isn't great, but he is decent, with double incap, outwit, and being a strong candidate for WW TA/bracelets to make that traited super senses shine. Much like Batman, I've found a points economical Spidey with outwit can be very useful to a team.
December 15, 2021
SpyderNick88

December 14, 2021
Buckwheat
I could care less whether or not the dial is definitive. It's just plain bad. Spider-Man can dodge sniper fire and leap three stories at once. The paltry starting defense, and lack of improved movement, is unacceptable.
December 14, 2021
Brundun94
It's amazing that some of you still don't get that wizkids only puts out definitive versions of main characters about once every 4 - 6 years. Everything else is just a glimpse. This Spidey is fine, and there are easy ways to improve him that don't really go out of the way to make it happen. It's just not feasible for even 1 in every 2 dials to really encapsulate all aspects of a character. You run out of ideas fast that way.
